ARABIC: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: you have discharged your vision.' That is how We recompense good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You have fulfilled your dream." Thus do We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you have indeed fulfilled your dream. Thus do We reward the good-doers.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: you have fulfilled what you were commanded to do in your dream." Thus do We reward the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “You have indeed made the dream come true”; and this is how We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You have fulfilled the dream!" Verily, thus do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You have indeed shown the truth of the vision; surely thus do We reward the doers of good:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou hast confirmed the vision; even so We recompense the good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou hast already fulfilled the vision. Lo! thus do We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: you have fulfilled the dream." It is thus indeed that We reward those who do good,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of a surety thou hast fulfilled the vision. Verily We! thus We recompense the well-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You have indeed fulfilled your vision! Thus indeed do We reward the virtuous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou hast already fulfilled the vision!" - thus indeed do We reward those who do right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You have fulfilled the dream (vision)!" Verily! Thus do We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers - see V. 2:112).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: you have confirmed your vision' As such We recompense the gooddoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have fulfilled the vision.” Thus We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:105] Verily you have fulfilled the vision’, by what you have done, in that you were able to go through with the act of sacrifice. In other words, that [which you have done] suffices for you [as redemption] (the statement nādaynāhu, ‘We called to him’, is the response to the lammā, ‘when’, so that the wāw [in wa-nādaynāhu, ‘We called to him’] is extra). So, in the same way that We have rewarded you, do We reward those who are virtuous, to their own souls in obeying the Command [of God], by removing from them their distress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Thou hast already fulfilled the vision) you have fulfilled what you were commanded in the dream vision. (Lo! thus do We reward the good) in their words and works.
